title: Servers Down?
body: Just wondering if anyone else cant login? i was logged in before and it said i disconnected from servers but my net was fine so i just tried to relog and can't login.

replies.body: A day late, but I'm able to log in fine atm.
yeah i cant log in ive been trying for about 30 mins, i got d/c 'ed from pvp.net after my game and still cant come in :/ and the website says the server is online?
five people have looked at this and not said if they are having the same issue. A simple yes or no would be helpful thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=awsumlad,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=4s7p4snm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-05T15:29:40.787+0000)
>
> five people have looked at this and not said if they are having the same issue. A simple yes or no would be helpful thanks.


They are having problems with the server, they will probably fix it shortly.
